Improve this resume bullet:
""Hi everyone,We are looking for an experienced graphic designer to create a uniquely memorable logo (not a picture) for a unique rental vacation home: a woodsy-tropical vibe. The home is often described as an oasis because it is a surprise, tucked away within one of the most popular areas of town.The ultimate guests of this vacation rental vary, but with a common thread: they want a tranquil location that embraces nature, yet are close to modern amenities, art, entertainment, restaurants, sports, etc. The venue services businessman on a trip, wanting something outside of a hotel setting as well as honeymoon, quinceañera, weddings, family retreats, birthdays, etc.The logo should be abstract but representative. It should be clear and discernible. Logo will be used both as a standalone and with wording.The ideal candidate must be a creative thinker, capturing subtleties in design. Of course it helps to be proficient in the use of the latest graphic designing tools but hand drawn artwork is fine. Critical attention to detail and the view of a consumer. It is the consumer that ultimately concludes what an image represents, not the designer.Some conditions for the logo:- 4 different initial concepts- Unlimited revisions- Logo transparency- Vector file- Printable file- Include source filePlease send your best designs along with your presentation letter.Thank you.Budget: $50Posted On: February 19, 2024 15:46 UTCCategory: Logo DesignSkills:Logo Design, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Brand Identity & GuidelinesSkills: Logo Design, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Brand Identity & GuidelinesCountry: United States""
